com.skysql.monitor
Class monAPI

java.lang.Object
  com.skysql.monitor.monAPI

public class monAPI
extends java.lang.Object

The interface to the SkySQL Manager API, a REST interface to the monitor database. This is the API that should be used to store all monitor observations and to retrieve system configuration information rather than access the SQLite monitoring database directly.

Author:
Mark Riddoch

Constructor Detail

monAPI

public monAPI()
Construct the monAPI instance. This consists of obtaining the information required to contact the API. This information is available via Java System Properties.

Method Detail

MonitorValue

public boolean MonitorValue(int systemID,
                            int nodeID,
                            int monitorID,
                            java.lang.String value)
Populate a monitor value for a given node.

Parameters:
systemID - The ID of the System
nodeID - The ID of the node within the system that the data refers to
monitorID - The ID of the monitor itself
value - The observed value
Returns:
True if the update was performed to the API

MonitorValue

                            int monitorID,
                            java.lang.String value)
Populate a monitor value for the system

Parameters:
systemID - The ID of the System
monitorID - The ID of the monitor itself
value - The observed value
Returns:
True if the update was performed to the API

restPost

private boolean restPost(java.lang.String restRequest,
                         java.lang.String pName,
                         java.lang.String pValue)
Send a POST request to the API

Parameters:
restRequest - The URL, excluding the fixed stem
pName - The parameter name for the post request
pValue - The parameter value for the port request

restPost

private boolean restPost(java.lang.String restRequest,
                         java.lang.String[] pName,
                         java.lang.String[] pValue)
Send a POST request to the API

Parameters:
restRequest - The URL, excluding the fixed stem
pName - The parameter names for the post request
pValue - The parameter values for the port request
